alert.note: Alert for Archer; Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:58AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN LOVE...SOUTHERN STEPHENS...SOUTHWESTERN CARTER...CLAY AND EAST CENTRAL ARCHER COUNTIES... At 158 AM CDT, the leading edge of winds from severe thunderstorms was located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Loco to near Terral to 4 miles southeast of Windthorst, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Henrietta, Waurika, Healdton, Wilson, Comanche, Ringling, Ryan, Scotland, Windthorst, Terral, Bellevue, Hastings, Loco, Addington, Sugden, Bluegrove, Grady, Corum, Oscar and Waurika Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
